name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Salesforce Engineer with a strong background in project management and sales process optimization, I leverage my expertise in **Salesforce**, including **Sales Cloud**, **Flow Builder**, and **Lightning App Builder**, to design and implement high-impact solutions that streamline pipeline management. I utilize tools like **Data Loader**, **HubSpot**, **Outreach**, **Gong**, and **ZoomInfo** to enhance data accuracy and drive effective communication across teams. 
With 8 years of full-stack development experience, I possess a comprehensive understanding of software engineering best practices, including CI/CD automation and agile methodologies. My previous roles in healthcare and finance have honed my ability to deliver high-performance applications while adhering to compliance standards, and I am adept in leveraging my technical knowledge to integrate systems seamlessly. I prioritize collaboration and strategic project execution to achieve project goals efficiently.
